bib.title: Competence region modelling in relational classification
bib.author: Kajdanowicz, Tomasz and Filipowski, Tomasz and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr
bib.abstract: Relational classification is a promising branch of machine learning techniques for classification in networked environments which does not fulfil the iid assumption (independent and identically distributed). During the past few years, researchers have proposed many relational classification methods. However, almost none of them was able to work efficiently with large amounts of data or sparsely labelled networks. It is introduced in this paper a new approach to relational classification based on competence region
bib.booktitle: Asian Conference on Intelligent Information and Database Systems
